results.reason_for_recall: Graceleigh, Inc. dba Sammys Milk is recalling certain lots of Sammys Milk (Baby Food) because of possible presence of Cronobacter, a bacteria that can cause severe and sometimes fatal bloom infections or meningitis in infants (under 12 months of age) and it may not provide adequate nutritional levels of iron.
results.product_description: Sammy's Milk (Baby Food), Net Wt. 12.84 oz (364 g), 6 containers per case
